thread.title: Consider non-traditional bond funds for volatile times, says Michael Hans

title: Consider non-traditional bond funds for volatile times, says Michael Hans
text:
Consider non-traditional bond funds for volatile times, says Michael Hans Monday, March 26, 2018 - 06:29 
Clarfeld Financial Advisors' chief investment officer offers tips on how to position fixed income portfolios in the absence of a flight to quality in a conversation with Reuters' Fred Katayama ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript
